column4: I'm having trouble connecting to my colleges wifi while im using ubuntu on my laptop. I went there and the tech support guy gave me the XP guide to use since it explains what kind of authentication and encription to use. So I set up a custom network but it still won't connect. The only thing I see that the guide explains to use but I can't designate is that it asks to use AES for the Data Encription. There isn't anywhere to designate the type of encription
in the wireless configureation though. Any help?
Do you see your college network listed?
Yes I do see them listed.
